Package jason.functions

Class Length

java.lang.Object
jason.asSemantics.DefaultArithFunction
jason.functions.Length
All Implemented Interfaces:
ArithFunction, java.io.Serializable
public class Length
extends DefaultArithFunction

Function: .length(L): returns the size of either the list or string L.

Examples:

  • .length("aa"): returns 2.
  • .length([a,b,c]): returns 3.
Author:
Jomi
See Also:
internal action version, Serialized Form
